ai-patthana19.7:0.2_0: under the investigation of the Dhamma: One whatever is suitable for the three times of the Dhamma
ai-patthana19.7:1.1_0: There is no reason for the sake of rapture ...
ai-patthana19.7:3.1_0: Equanimity of equanimity arises dependent on the teaching, and on the cause of the reason it arises.
ai-patthana19.7:3.1_1: Equanimity arises in him on the teaching, and there are four reasons.
ai-patthana19.7:3.1_2: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana19.7:4.1_0: (These eighth causes and reasons) eight roams ...
